author: Cara Lombardo
title: Avon Gives Activist Group Board Seat, Avoiding Proxy Fight
text:
Avon Products Inc. plans to cede a board seat to an activist investor, the company said Monday, as part of a deal that will help the struggling beauty company avoid a proxy fight.
James Mitarotonda of Barington Capital Group LP is expected to get a board seat in exchange for an agreement to support management. In connection with the agreement, Barington and its allies have agreed to support the boardâ€™s nominees rather than nominate their own as they told the company they intended to do earlier this month.
